name: Sparks the Elemental Dragon
text: This card is also always treated as a Dragon-type monster. You can only activate this card’s effects if you’ve activated 2 or more "Sparks" this Duel. You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Sparks" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Sparks the Elemental Dragon" once per turn.
